content.query:
SELECT top (100)
    CAST( time as date ) as fecha
    , CodigoNAcional as estacion 
    , max(ts_valor) as tmax 
    , min(ts_valor) as tmin 
    , max(ts_valor) - min(ts_valor) as tvar
    , round( avg(ts_valor),2) as tmed
    FROM dbo.temperatura
    group by CAST( time as date ), CodigoNAcional
